document_data.name: Lord Yeschant
document_data.mainbody: '''Lord Yeschant''' was an inhabitant of [[Cormanthyr]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Lord Yeschant participated a covert meeting with the people of other houses, conspiring against [[Coronal]] [[Eltargrim]], on {{yearlink|241}} after the hunting of [[Elminster Aumar]]. He named the death of his son, who had participated in the hunt for Elminster, as a reason for his participation.
